mapper.select: SELECT EXTRACT(DAY FROM mo.order_date) AS "day", NVL(SUM(mo.amount), 0) AS "sum" FROM member_order mo WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM mo.order_date) = #{year} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM mo.order_date) = #{month} GROUP BY EXTRACT(DAY FROM mo.order_date) ORDER BY EXTRACT(DAY FROM mo.order_date)

SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM mo.order_date) AS "month", NVL(SUM(mo.amount), 0) AS "sum" FROM member_order mo WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM mo.order_date) = #{year} GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM mo.order_date) ORDER BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM mo.order_date)
SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM mo.order_date) AS "year", NVL(SUM(mo.amount), 0) AS "sum" FROM member_order mo GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM mo.order_date) ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM mo.order_date)
